projectsStarted.name: Fan Street Team
projectsStarted.description: Fan Street Team (fan.st) brought the core idea of RadioMixtape back with a pure HTML5 Audio player, streamlined music encoding, and the ability to hide music tracks in physical spaces with the use of the JavaScript GeoLocation API

projectsStarted.name: XRAE
projectsStarted.description: XRAE is a risk assessment platform with a single questionnaire (with over 600 personal medical questions) and over 100,000 underwriting rules programmed in a web based authoring environment that assesses the health class for 13 leading insurance carriers. XRAE is used as a pre-screener for a growing list of insurance carriers as well as a customer manager for thousands of field agents.

projectsStarted.name: Degree Designer
projectsStarted.description: The Blue Jay Degree Designer is an automated advisement system that manages Student/Counselor communication, provides dynamic and interactive Ed Plan, Semester Plan and Schedule building as well as rich reporting of Student Trends, Success Analysis and Program Effectiveness.

projectsStarted.name: FastSchedule.net
projectsStarted.description: FastSchedule.net is a powerful web application that acts like a search engine for student schedules.

projectsStarted.name: Radio Mixtape
projectsStarted.description: Radio Mixtape was a social music sharing service that enabled fans to express their musical identity with the songs that bands would host on their websites (A "Radio Mixtape" is a mixtape made up songs played on the radio).

projectsStarted.name: MixBox.mobi
projectsStarted.description: MixBox.mobi took the sharing aspect of Radio Mixtape and made it available on mobile phones using a duel WML 1.0 and XHTML-MP (phones from 2002 to today), interface and email and SMS sharing.

projectsPersonal.name: WADParser.py
projectsPersonal.description: A Python script that parses DOOM WAD files and renders them as SVG.

projectsPersonal.name: GRPParser.py
projectsPersonal.description: A Python script that parses Duke 3D GRP files and renders as SVG.

projectsPersonal.name: adventure.js
projectsPersonal.description: An implementation of the King's Quest engine in JavaScript using the <canvas> element.

projectsPersonal.name: Sound Test
projectsPersonal.description: A Sound Test for as many games as I can find
